short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click download: your full Amazon reading history as a spreadsheet, covering Kindle, Audible, and physical books

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use this program:  *********  https://bit.ly/book-list-extension-guide  *********

Please feel free to email me at app.maker.supreme@gmail.com for help.

Run this extension on:
* amazon.com/yourbooks to get extended info about all your Kindle, Audible and physical books, even the books you've borrowed and returned. 
Example file: bit.ly/all-amazon-books-spreadsheet
(amazon.com/yourbooks might not be available in your country)

* read.amazon.com to get basic info about your Kindle books (only include books you can currently read).
Example file: bit.ly/kindle-books-spreadsheet

The file format is csv, which can be opened easily in Excel or Google Sheet.

-----

You can try this for free, then get the full usage with a license key (just $1):
bit.ly/amazon-book-list-exporter-license
